mapper.sql: ID, LOGIN_NAME, PASSWORD, MOBILE, EMAIL, EMAIL_ACTIVATE_CODE, ENABLED, PERIOD_START, PERIOD_END, CREATE_DATE,LOGIN_DATE, CUST_ID, CUST_TYPE, LAST_UPDATE_PASSWORD_TIME, LAST_LOGIN_LOCK_TIME, DESCRIPTION,REG_CHAN_CODE
mapper.insert: insert into T_CUST_USER (ID, LOGIN_NAME, PASSWORD, MOBILE, EMAIL, EMAIL_ACTIVATE_CODE, ENABLED, PERIOD_START, PERIOD_END, CREATE_DATE,LOGIN_DATE, CUST_ID, CUST_TYPE, LAST_UPDATE_PASSWORD_TIME, LAST_LOGIN_LOCK_TIME, DESCRIPTION,REG_CHAN_CODE) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{emailActivateCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enabled,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{periodStart,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{periodEnd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{loginDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{custId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastUpdatePasswordTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastLoginLockTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regChanCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update T_CUST_USER
LOGIN_NAME = #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MOBILE = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMAIL_ACTIVATE_CODE = #{emailActivateCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ENABLED = #{enabled,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PERIOD_START = #{periodStart,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PERIOD_END = #{periodEnd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LOGIN_DATE = #{loginDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CUST_ID = #{custId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUST_TYPE = #{custType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAST_UPDATE_PASSWORD_TIME = #{lastUpdatePasswordTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LAST_LOGIN_LOCK_TIME = #{lastLoginLockTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REG_CHAN_CODE = #{regChanCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update T_CUST_USER set LOGIN_NAME = #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MOBILE = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMAIL_ACTIVATE_CODE = #{emailActivateCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ENABLED = #{enabled,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PERIOD_START = #{periodStart,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PERIOD_END = #{periodEnd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LOGIN_DATE = #{loginDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CUST_ID = #{custId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUST_TYPE = #{custType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAST_UPDATE_PASSWORD_TIME = #{lastUpdatePasswordTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LAST_LOGIN_LOCK_TIME = #{lastLoginLockTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},REG_CHAN_CODE = #{regChanCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select count(*) from T_CUST_USER tcu join T_CUST_PERSON tcp on tcu.CUST_ID = tcp.ID AND tcp.CERT_STATUS=1
select count(*) from T_CUST_USER tcu join T_CUST_PERSON tcp on tcu.CUST_ID = tcp.ID AND tcp.CERT_STATUS!=1

select count(*) from T_CUST_USER tcu join T_CUST_PERSON tcp on tcu.CUST_ID = tcp.ID AND tcp.CERT_STATUS=1 AND DATE_FORMAT(tcu.CREATE_DATE,'%Y-%m')= DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(),INTERVAL 1 MONTH),'%Y-%m')

select count(*) from T_CUST_USER tcu join T_CUST_PERSON tcp on tcu.CUST_ID = tcp.ID AND tcp.CERT_STATUS!=1 AND DATE_FORMAT(tcu.CREATE_DATE,'%Y-%m')= DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(),INTERVAL 1 MONTH),'%Y-%m')
select count(*) from T_CUST_USER tcu join T_CUST_PERSON tcp on tcu.CUST_ID = tcp.ID AND tcp.CERT_STATUS=1 AND DATE_FORMAT(tcu.CREATE_DATE,'%Y-%m')= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m')
select count(*) from T_CUST_USER tcu join T_CUST_PERSON tcp on tcu.CUST_ID = tcp.ID AND tcp.CERT_STATUS!=1 AND DATE_FORMAT(tcu.`CREATE_DATE`,'%Y-%m')= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m')
select count(*) from T_CUST_USER tcu join T_CUST_PERSON tcp on tcu.CUST_ID = tcp.ID AND tcp.CERT_STATUS=1 AND YEARWEEK(DATE_FORMAT(tcu.CREATE_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d'))= YEARWEEK(NOW())
select count(*) from T_CUST_USER tcu join T_CUST_PERSON tcp on tcu.CUST_ID = tcp.ID AND tcp.CERT_STATUS!=1 AND YEARWEEK(DATE_FORMAT(tcu.CREATE_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d'))= YEARWEEK(NOW())
